Text:
so if anyone can give an explanation for why some of my torrents stop at 99.8% that would be greatly appriciated, 

i hate wasting bandwidth, and i'm sure you guys do too.

NEXT: Meatloaf - Bat Out of Hell (Oh Yeah)
I had some torrents that did that to. I think I did some mistakes like change something in the archive or retagged some files after I made the torrent. Could be that. So I don't do that any more :).
By the way Thanks for a whole lot of good uoloads.

see thats the thing, i'm really good about not "touching" the folders after their ready, i have them all organized in their own folder, the only other thing i can think of is that i was listening to one of the tracks while i made the torrent, and after i closed winamp, some value changed somewhere or something and yeah FAIL. oh well i guess i can just hope it dosent happen again.

and you quite welcome, any requests?
just realized a mistake i made with the same file, just remove the .!ut from the extention and it'll play

Downloading. Can't wait to listen to this!
